ygData.subject: Re: [eqenchanters] Where can I find PP?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... The normal answer for a poor enchanter is Stein of Moggok .  You can do it in under 4 hours (less if you know someone who teleports), and it should net
ygData.messageBody:
On Wed, 24 May 2000 koosh@... wrote:

> I was wondering where an enchater that is Highelven, find the PP to
> raise her jewlery skill. My skill lvl is 25 right now and my lvl is
> 12th. I do have enchant silver and have been selling +2 magic jewlery.

The normal answer for a poor enchanter is "Stein of Moggok". You can do
it in under 4 hours (less if you know someone who teleports), and it
should net you 200pp or so. Someone told me they'd changed the factions a
few patches ago, so you can't do it until you get Illusion:Ogre. Anyone
have current info on whether a L12 can still do this quest?

A better answer is "level up". Don't bother with jewelcraft until you're
mid-30s and have lots of money.
--
Mark Rafn dagon@... <http://www.dagon.net/> !G
